job_title: Department Administrator in New York, NY
pros: Healthcare is paid for through the company, paid leave, vacation time starting immediately, and a merger with a larger, Jewish university gives us all Jewish holidays off. Most all of the staff and faculty are kind.
cons: Somewhat demanding role, requiring employees to arrive early or stay late with little notice. Pay is not consistent across departments for the same position. Issues with diversity. Management (specifically higher-ups) cater to the students and do not support their staff/faculty nearly as much or enough.

job_title: Anonymous Employee in New York, NY
pros: Coworkers where a pleasure to work with.  Always willing to help.
cons: Upper management were stuck in there ways and never wanted to try any new procedures or ideas.  They seem afraid of change.
